messages.msgSnippet: Oh yeah, and when you write that article, I get to read it first!! ~Elissa Cleaveland It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
messages.messageBody:
Oh yeah, and when you write that article, I get to read it first!!
~Elissa Cleaveland
"It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
have
not yet entirely strangled the holy curiosity of inquiry." A. Einstein

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] COmics was: NEW unschooling thread
messages.msgSnippet: As far as easy-ish yet interesting books, have you tried the Magic Treehouse series? Casey loves those. She also likes Nate the Great and anything with a bit
messages.messageBody:
As far as easy-ish yet interesting books, have you tried the Magic Treehouse
series? Casey loves those. She also likes Nate the Great and anything with a
bit of a mystery in it. Conor liked The Zach Files.

Thanks Mary
The books above are too difficult and intimidating, she prefers the larger
print of the easy readers but the stories are "dumb"
I'm going to get her a bunch of comic books and magazine subscriptions too.
~Elissa Cleaveland
"It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
have
not yet entirely strangled the holy curiosity of inquiry." A. Einstein
